plot: Trace discovers the body of his brother, Jerry and confronts Mr. Sutton the crook responsible for his brother's death. In self-defence Trace shoots Mr. Sutton. Sutton sends his henchmen to hunt and kill a wounded and fleeing Trace. Maria a half-breed Mexican girl, who's father was murdered by Sutton, becomes Trace's companion in flight.   Written by  Kelly
title: Colinas ardientes
